scripts.start: tsc src/sortingAlgorithms/countingSort.ts src/sortingAlgorithms/mergesort.ts src/components/Menu.tsx src/constants.ts src/sortingAlgorithms/insertionSort.ts src/components/App.tsx src/components/Bar.tsx src/components/SortingVisualiser.tsx src/utils.ts --jsx react --esModuleInterop --watch --outdir compiledJS
scripts.test: watchify compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/countingSort.js compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/mergesort.js compiledJS/components/Menu.js compiledJS/constants.js compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/insertionSort.js compiledJS/components/App.js compiledJS/components/Bar.js compiledJS/components/SortingVisualiser.js compiledJS/utils.js -o bundledJS/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/countingSort.js compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/mergesort.js compiledJS/components/Menu.js compiledJS/constants.js compiledJS/sortingAlgorithms/insertionSort.js compiledJS/components/App.js compiledJS/components/Bar.js compiledJS/components/SortingVisualiser.js compiledJS/utils.js -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle > productionJS/bundle.js
